Name: HAM-MASTER
About the game: Alien pirates stole the mice's treasure, leaving them without gold to trade for food, but King HAM-MASTER will not allow that to happen. Upon realizing that the treasure was stolen, with great courage the king HAM-MASTER goes in search of the thieves to recover the stolen treasure. HAM-MASTER brings the difficulties of the old school classic SNES titles such as Donkey Kong ,Super mario world and Super Mario Bros. 2, with similar gameplay. Each level contains well-adjusted traps, constantly testing the player's ability to overcome them while collecting all the fallen stars from his stolen treasure chest. FEATURES Play 20 beautiful hand-crafted levels filled with deadly traps. Donâ€™t think you will complete the game fast Fight Against Bosses to Unlock the Next Map. use your special power to become immortal and advancing in stages. Contains Savepoints On All Maps. Fluid Gameplay, With Precise Controls.
